titles.title: To agree to the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 2339) with an amendment.

action.text: Mr. Owens moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/8/1994--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 2339 (revising and extending the programs of the Technology-Related Assistance for Individuals With Disabilities Act of 1988) and agreeing to the Senate amendment thereto with an amendment.
